meta_content: Book your NYC stay along with your dream itinerary in one place.
long_desc: See the latest Broadway shows like Aladdin or book a special tour across the Brooklyn Bridge, Triumph Hotels and Reserve Direct have all you need to make your dream NYC itinerary. At The Evelyn, guests like you get the best value for your stay and tickets to New York City's must-see attractions.
short_desc: Book your NYC stay along with your dream itinerary in one place.
title: Build Your NYC Itinerary
